aggregateID.description: The account were the money was withdraw unique id.

aggregateName.description: The name of the aggregate being affected by the event

correlationID.description: An agrupation ID for correlated events

aggregateVersion.description: The version of the aggregate after being modified by this event

amount.description: The ammount of cents withdrawn of the account.

createdAt.description: The date when the event happened (YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss).
